divs: Sighting Detailswas in janos chihuahua mexico driving back to his house at night when coming around a curve we noticed it hovering on top of a hill it was round and had lots of colorful lights all around. dont remember much of it after or how i lost sight of it
Summary: driving on road seen it hovering over hill
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Ciudad Juarez
There were no other sightings in Ciudad Juarez on or around June 20th 1985
